# Numeric vectors

```{r}
c(1.2,3.5,5.0,6.7,1.09e-3)
```

```{r}
x <- c(1.2,3.5,5.0,6.7,1.09e-3)
length(x)
```

```{r}
1:100
```

```{r}
x <- c(1,2,3,4,5)
y <- c(3,2,3,2,3)
z <- x + y
print(z)
```

```{r}
x <- c(3,2,4,8,7)
y <- x + 1
print(y)
```

```{r}
x <- c(3,2,4,8,7)
y <- x + c(1,1,1,1,1)
print(y)
```

```{r}
1 + NA
```

```{r}
x <- c(-2,-1,0,1,2)
1/x
```

```{r}
x/0
```
